creator: mike@vee.net
text:
If you specify an object that is an Iterator for the "items" attribute of a JSTL forEach tag, you get a 
NullPointerException.

The class org.apache.jasper.tagplugins.jstl.ForEach needs to have the following code inserted at line 
140

ctxt.generateJavaSource("else if (" + itemsV + " instanceof Iterator)");
ctxt.generateJavaSource(iterV + "=(Iterator)" + itemsV + ";");

(apologies for not attaching a real diff)

creator: jan.luehe@sun.com
text: Thanks for the patch, which I have applied.
